title: The Vicious Cycle of Mass Incarceration and Racial Injustice
itunes:title: The Vicious Cycle of Mass Incarceration and Racial Injustice
description: MIT economic historian Peter Temin discusses parts of his forthcoming book, focusing on the history of mass incarceration of uneducated Blacks and how it has created a permanent class of poor Black Americans
content:encoded: MIT economic historian Peter Temin discusses parts of his forthcoming book, focusing on the history of mass incarceration of uneducated Blacks and how it has created a permanent class of poor Black Americans
